avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has settled and strengthened in the mild weather over the past few days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: In recent days, the snow has settled and strengthened in the mild weather. There is still snow in the mountains after snowfall in early March, and small wind slabs can likely be found on top of hard snow at higher elevations. The snow is expected to continue strengthening in the mild weather over the coming days.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has strengthened in mild conditions across the country in recent days. Small loose snow avalanches may occur with continued mild weather. The diurnal cycle is having a stabilizing effect on the snowpack in many areas.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has strengthened in mild conditions across the country in recent days. Small loose snow avalanches may occur with continued mild weather.

weatherForecast.highlights: Áfram má búast við mildu veðri, stöku skúrum og sunnanáttum næstu daga.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided in warm weather and is generally isothermal. It should continue to strengthen in mild weather.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Mild weather with little precipitation is expected in the coming days, so the snow should continue to settle and strengthen over time. Avalanches may occur in isolated gullies where wind slabs may still be still present, especially during warming and when in the direct sun.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has strengthened in mild conditions across the country in recent days. Small loose snow avalanches may occur with continued mild weather. The diurnal cycle is having a stabilizing effect on the snowpack in many areas.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has strengthened in mild conditions across the country in recent days. Small loose snow avalanches may occur with continued mild weather.

weatherForecast.highlights: S átt og breytileg, milt veður og lítilsháttar rigning.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has settled after warm and sunny weather in recent days, but older wind slabs still remain at higher elevations. Diurnal temperature fluctuations continue to affect the snowpack. Small loose snow avalanches could occur on steep slopes.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Diurnal fluctuations are affecting the snowpack these days. Some softer snow or old wind slabs can be found in gullies and depressions at higher elevations. The past few days have been warm and sunny, leading to wet loose avalanches. Blowing snow occurred in the mountains on Monday, possibly accumulating in east-facing aspects. Loose snow or small wet avalanches may occur where the sun reaches and due to warming temperatures.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has strengthened in mild conditions across the country in recent days. Small loose snow avalanches may occur with continued mild weather. The diurnal cycle is having a stabilizing effect on the snowpack in many areas.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has strengthened in mild conditions across the country in recent days. Small loose snow avalanches may occur with continued mild weather.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Little or no snow  at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains. Small slabs could persist in places in high elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has strengthened in mild conditions across the country in recent days. Small loose snow avalanches may occur with continued mild weather. The diurnal cycle is having a stabilizing effect on the snowpack in many areas.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has strengthened in mild conditions across the country in recent days. Small loose snow avalanches may occur with continued mild weather.

weatherForecast.highlights: Fremur hæg breytileg átt, Þurrt að mestur og milt veður.
